titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Young Americans for Freedom records
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Emilia Schrier and Loralee Sepsey

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-03-31T14:51-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Processing of collection (started by Emilia Schrier) completed by Loralee Sepsey.

did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, minutes, convention and meeting materials, newsletters, bulletins, leaflets, flyers, legal and financial records, membership records and mailings, printed matter, and audiovisual material relating to political conservatism in the United States and on American college campuses.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Young Americans for Freedom records, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2011.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: American ideologically conservative student and youth activism organization that was founded in 1960 as a coalition between traditional conservatives and libertarians on American college campuses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, minutes, convention and meeting materials, newsletters, bulletins, leaflets, flyers, legal and financial records, membership records and mailings, printed matter, and audiovisual material relating to political conservatism in the United States and on American college campuses.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Spiro Agnew, Howard Baker, George H. W. Bush, and James Marin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Pat Buchanan, Bill Archer, and Jack Kemp.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with William F. Buckley Jr., Bob Dole, and John A. Welborn.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with James Watt.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with William F. Buckley Jr., David Dreier, Edward Koch, Clarence Pendleton Jr., Phyllis Schafly, Jim Ellis, Newton Russell, and Ed Zschau.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Bob Dole.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Daniel Manion, Senator Barry Goldwater, William F. Buckley Jr., and David Dreier.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Pat Buchanan, Pat Nolan, Owen Johnson, and William F. Buckley Jr.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Al McCandless, George Wortley, and William F. Buckley, Jr.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Amo Houghton.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Pat Buchanan.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Dan Quayle.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Bill Morrow, Mike Briggs, Elton Gallegly, and W. M. J. "Pete" Knight.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Christopher Cox and Ron Paul.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with William F. Buckley, Jr.
